briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety of Topical Administration of FMX103 in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Papulopustular Rosacea
officialTitle: An Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety of Topical Administration of FMX103 for 40 Weeks in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Facial Papulopustular Rosacea (Study FX2016-13)
summary: The primary objective is to show that open-label extended treatment with FMX103 1.5%, for up to an additional 40 weeks, is safe and well tolerated.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change From Baseline in Inflammatory Lesion Count at Week 40
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 0/ Baseline (Final visit of previous DB study [Week 12]) and at Week 40
